# 2023 King's Cup

| champion       = Iraq
| count          = 1
| second         = Thailand
| third          = Lebanon
| fourth         = India
| num_teams      = 4
| confederations = 1

| prevseason     = 2022
| nextseason     = 2024
|top_scorer= Ayman Hussein(2 goals)}}
The '''2023 Annual King's Cup Football Tournament (), also referred to as 2023 Thailand King's Cup''', was the 49th King's Cup, the annual international men's football tournament organized by Football Association of Thailand.
As hosts, Thailand participated automatically in the tournament; they were joined by the AFC teams Iraq, Lebanon and India. Iraq became the champions after defeating Thailand by 5–4 on penalties in the final. With two goals, Aymen Hussein of Iraq was the top scorer of the tournament.
Participating teams
The following teams participated in the tournament:
